Package com.quinsoft.zeidon.config

Provides classes for configuring the Zeidon .Object Engine.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HomeDirectory
    Interface for determining the JOE home directory.
    JmxZeidonPreferencesMBean  
    UuidGenerator
    Interface for generating UUIDs in Zeidon to give every object a unique ID.
    ZeidonPreferences
    Defines the interface for retrieving Zeidon preferences.
    ZeidonPreferencesFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultPreferencesFactory
    A simple implementation of the ZeidonPreferencesFactory that returns a supplied object by default.
    HomeDirectoryFromEnvVar
    Retrieves the home directory from ZEIDON_HOM env var.
    HomeDirectoryFromString
    Implementation of HomeDirectory that is a supplied string.
    JmxZeidonPreferences
    A wrapper class around a ZeidonPreferences implementation to make it easier to manage the preferences via JMX.
    ZeidonIniPreferences
    Reads preferences from zeidon.ini.
    ZeidonPropertyPreferences
    Reads Zeidon preferences from a .properties file.

Package com.quinsoft.zeidon.config Description

Provides classes for configuring the Zeidon .Object Engine. Applications use this package if they are to specify a configuration other than the default zeidon.ini.
